fields_of_interest: Business and Industry, Environment, Research and innovation, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Enevo is actively working with its customers to accelerate shift towards circular economy and thus Enevo is following the Circular Economy Package initiative of EU.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Enevo Oy's subsidiary company Enevo UK is a member of the APSE in UK: http://www.apse.org.uk/apse/
goals__remit: Efficiency for managing the raw material supply chain in the waste and recycling industry
relevant_communication:
Enevo is running SmartWASTE project to improve logistics for waste and recycling operations in European cities.  
This project has received funding from the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme under grant agreement No 724613.
